title: Pizza Dough
steps: Add water and oil. Mix until dough forms.
Knead until smooth and elastic, 8-10 minutes.
Place in oiled bowl. Cover, let rise until doubled, 1-2 hours.
Use immediately or refrigerate up to 3 days.
Let cold dough come to room temp before shaping.
notes: Bread flour has more gluten for chewy texture.
High heat is essential for crispy crust.
